name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！ #天音かなた生誕祭 「堕天使の憂鬱」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Melancholy of the Fallen Angel＂【ホロライブ】 [UdbB5g1ncHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Lost One no Goukoku' (Lost One's Weeping) with a megaphone mic and guest dancers.
MC section: Kanata talks about her performance and introduces a major announcement VTR.
VTR announcement for Amane Kanata's 2nd album 'Trigger'.
MC section: Kanata reacts to the album announcement and introduces the next new song.

subtitles.original: 不自由ない世間に生きたいと願って
subtitles.english: Wishing to live in a world without constraints

subtitles.original: どうして僕たちは　時々に　「いや　毎日」
subtitles.english: Why do we, occasionally, "no, every day"...

subtitles.original: 悲しいって言うんだ
subtitles.english: ...say we're sad?

subtitles.original: 淋しいって言うんだ
subtitles.english: Say we're lonely?

subtitles.original: 黒板のこの漢字が読めますか
subtitles.english: Can you read this kanji on the blackboard?

subtitles.original: あの子の心象は読めますか
subtitles.english: Can you read that child's state of mind?

subtitles.original: その心を黒く染めたのは
subtitles.english: The one who dyed that heart black...

subtitles.original: おい誰なんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, who was it?

subtitles.original: おい誰なんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, who was it?

subtitles.original: そろばんのこの式が解けますか
subtitles.english: Can you solve this formula on the abacus?

subtitles.original: あの子の首の輪も解けますか
subtitles.english: Can you undo the noose around that child's neck, too?

subtitles.original: 僕らこのままでいいんですか
subtitles.english: Is it okay for us to stay like this?

subtitles.original: おいどうすんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you gonna do?

subtitles.original: おいどうすんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you gonna do?

subtitles.original: いつまで経ったって僕たちは
subtitles.english: No matter how much time passes, we...

subtitles.original: 存在証明に酔い痴れて
subtitles.english: ...get intoxicated by proof of existence

subtitles.original: どうしようもないくらいの嬌傲を
subtitles.english: ...an unbearable amount of arrogance...

subtitles.original: ずっと　隠していたんだ
subtitles.english: ...we've been hiding it all along.

subtitles.original: 昨日の宿題は相変わらず解けないや
subtitles.english: I still can't solve yesterday's homework.

subtitles.original: 過不足ない　不自由ない　最近に生きたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to live in these perfect, free, recent days

subtitles.original: でもどうして僕たちの　胸元の塊は
subtitles.english: But why does the lump in our chests...

subtitles.original: 消えたいって言うんだ
subtitles.english: ...say it wants to disappear?

subtitles.original: 死にたいって言うんだ
subtitles.english: Says it wants to die?

subtitles.original: 黒板のこの漢字が読めますか
subtitles.english: Can you read this kanji on the blackboard?

subtitles.original: あの子の心象は読めますか
subtitles.english: Can you read that child's state of mind?

subtitles.original: その心を黒く染めたのは
subtitles.english: The one who dyed that heart black...

subtitles.original: おい誰なんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, who was it?

subtitles.original: おい誰なんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, who was it?

subtitles.original: そろばんのこの式が解けますか
subtitles.english: Can you solve this formula on the abacus?

subtitles.original: あの子の首の輪も解けますか
subtitles.english: Can you undo the noose around that child's neck, too?

subtitles.original: 僕らこのままでいいんですか
subtitles.english: Is it okay for us to stay like this?

subtitles.original: おいどうすんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you gonna do?

subtitles.original: おいどうすんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you gonna do?

subtitles.original: 面積比の公式言えますか
subtitles.english: Can you state the formula for area ratio?

subtitles.original: 子供の頃の夢は言えますか
subtitles.english: Can you state your childhood dream?

subtitles.original: その夢すら溝に捨てたのは
subtitles.english: The one who threw even that dream into the gutter...

subtitles.original: おい誰なんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, who was it?

subtitles.original: もう知ってんだろ
subtitles.english: You already know, don't you?

subtitles.original: いつになりゃ大人になれますか
subtitles.english: When will I be able to become an adult?

subtitles.original: そもそも大人とは一体全体何ですか
subtitles.english: What exactly is an "adult" in the first place?

subtitles.original: どなたに伺えばいいんですか
subtitles.english: Who should I ask?

subtitles.original: おいどうすんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you gonna do?

subtitles.original: もうどうだっていいや
subtitles.english: Oh, whatever, it doesn't matter anymore.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: はー、皆さん、どうも！
subtitles.english: Phew, hello everyone!

subtitles.original: ということで皆さん見てください
subtitles.english: So, everyone, look at this!

subtitles.original: メガホンマイク、そしてたくさんのゲストが来てくれました。ありがとう！
subtitles.english: The megaphone mic, and so many guests came! Thank you!

subtitles.original: かっこいいでしょ。
subtitles.english: It's cool, right?

subtitles.original: どうですか。
subtitles.english: What do you think?

subtitles.original: かっこいいよね。
subtitles.english: It's cool, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: という感じで。
subtitles.english: And with that...

subtitles.original: それでは皆さん。
subtitles.english: Now, everyone.

subtitles.original: 多分ドキドキ心待ちにしていたでしょう。
subtitles.english: I'm sure you've been waiting for this with excitement.

subtitles.original: 重大告知その1がVTRございますので
subtitles.english: We have a VTR for Major Announcement #1,

subtitles.original: 一旦そちらを見ていただこうと思います。
subtitles.english: so please take a look at that first.

subtitles.original: それでは、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here it is!

subtitles.original: 天音かなた 2nd Album
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 2nd Album

subtitles.original: Trigger
subtitles.english: Trigger

subtitles.original: Keep your finger on the "Trigger".
subtitles.english: Keep your finger on the "Trigger".

subtitles.original: みんなー！　アルバム出るぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! The album is coming out!

subtitles.original: Vどうでしたか？
subtitles.english: How was the VTR?

subtitles.original: ということでね、本当に詳細はまたこの後でという感じで
subtitles.english: So, I'll give more details later,

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます、皆さんのおかげで、またアルバムを出すことができました！
subtitles.english: but thank you so much! Thanks to you all, I'm able to release another album!

subtitles.original: そして、その後にね、もっとすごい告知もあるので絶対最後まで見てください。
subtitles.english: And after that, there's an even bigger announcement, so make sure to watch until the end.

subtitles.original: それではね、そちらのアルバムの中から1曲、新曲を聞いてもらいます。
subtitles.english: Now, I'm going to perform one of the new songs from that album.

subtitles.original: それでは聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: 「きゅーぴっど。」
subtitles.english: "Cupid."

subtitles.original: 何気ない声が（そわそわ）
subtitles.english: A casual voice (fidgeting)

subtitles.original: ちょっと不相応かな（まだまだっ）
subtitles.english: Is it a bit out of place? (not yet)

subtitles.original: いつからかそれが
subtitles.english: Since when did that...
